error_fetching_plant: Sorry, I'm experiencing trouble fetching the plant from my server. Please try again later.
error_invalid_add_remove_date: Remove date must be after add date
add_date_description: The date, the planting was added to the map. The planting was not on the map before this date.
remove_date_description: The date, the planting was removed from the map. The planting was on the map before this date. Per default, this is date is not set.
